author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)
Alternatively, PayPal donations can be sent here: http://paypal.me/whatdamath
Get a Wonderful Person Tee: https://teespring.com/stores/whatdamath
More cool designs are on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3QFIrFX

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about an idea of seeing the birth of the universe by looking past the cosmic microwave background
Links:
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2111.12186 
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2509.16732v1
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Recombination_(cosmology)
Previous videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ncjebD_Bpc
#cmb #universe #bigbang

0:00 CMB - cosmic microwave background is insane 
1:50 How it was produced after the Big Bang 
4:30 Initial observations and what they showed us 
5:55 What this confirmed about the Big Bang 
6:40 New data and observations from ACT 
8:15 Cosmic web evidence
title: Earliest Light in the Universe Reveals New Surprises (CMB Updates)
